p: Fast inactivation within about a second has been found for P2X 1 and P2X 3, and slightly slower for the P2X 4 receptors, whereas the other subtypes desensitize only slowly and incompletely. A special feature of the P2X 7 receptor is the formation of a large pore with a diameter of 3–5 nm after prolonged application of the agonist. Similar behaviour, where at least the ion selectivity changes after prolonged activation, is also discussed for the other subtypes.
